data.title: Maksim Chmerkovskiy: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Maksim Chmerkovskiy: Check out the list of all Maksim Chmerkovskiy movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Maksim Chmerkovskiy news on Times of India.
data.text:
Dancing with the Stars cast Maksim Chmerkovskiy, Peta Murgatroyd, and others along with their families celebrate Thanksgiving together

etimes.in / Nov 27, 2023, 07:33 (IST)

The Dancing with the Stars crew celebrated Thanksgiving in an exciting way, sharing pictures and videos on Instagram and social media. The cast, including Alfonso Ribeiro, Angela Unkrich, Maksim Chmerkovskiy, Peta Murgatroyd, Val Chmerkovskiy, Jenna Johnson, Sasha Farber, Alan Bersten, Brandon Armstrong, Koko Iwasaki, and Britt Stewart, celebrated with their families. Emma Slater shared funny face and smiling photos of the crew. They also shared glimpses of their Thanksgiving meal. Fans enjoyed watching the cast together and praised them on social media.

Maksim Chmerkovskiy is 'just friends' with Jennifer Lopez

Bang Showbiz / Jul 16, 2014, 15:36 (IST)

Maksim Chmerkovskiy insists he and Jennifer Lopez are ''just friends'' and he finds it hard conducting relationships in the public eye.

Karina Smirnoff calls off engagement

PTI / Mar 12, 2015, 12:59 (IST)

2009.She later got engaged to Brad Penny for a year in 2011.

Maksim Chmerkovskiy faces linguistic trouble on ‘Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa’

TNN / Jun 16, 2014, 17:06 (IST)

International choreographer and the winner of the 18th season of the US show ‘Dancing With The Stars’, Maksim Chmerkovskiy, seems to be having a lot of teething issues while shooting the show.

Remo will miss Salman Yusuff on Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa

TNN / Jun 07, 2014, 00:00 (IST)

Filmmaker and choreographer Remo D’Souza is upset that his favourite student Salman Yusuff Khan will not be a part of Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa as a choreographer like every year (he will only be seen in a special segment).

Winner of international show 'Dancing with the Stars' to judge 'Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa'

TNN / May 30, 2014, 00:00 (IST)

Winner of the 18th season of Dancing with the Stars, Maksim Chmerkovskiy, has been signed on to join Madhuri Dixit-Nene, Karan Johar and Remo D’Souza on the judging panel of dance reality show, Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa.

‘Dancing With the Stars’ fame Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy welcome their third child

etimes.in / Jul 13, 2024, 18:18 (IST)

Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy announce the birth of their third son, keeping his name under wraps for now. The couple's story, from Broadway to Dancing With the Stars to a growing family, is a mix of joy and challenges. Fans await more details on this latest addition.

The British version of Jhalak is very boring: Jhalak international judge

TNN / Jun 14, 2014, 00:00 (IST)

International choreographer and the winner of the 18th season of US show Dancing With The Stars, Maksim Chmerkovskiy, will appear as the fourth judge in tonight’s episode of Colors’ Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa.

Jennifer Lopez hangs out with Casper Smart

Bang Showbiz / Jun 27, 2014, 16:43 (IST)

Casper Smart supported Jennifer Lopez on the set of her upcoming movie, 'The Boy Next Door,' this week even though they recently ended their relationship.

Jennifer Lopez fancies David Gandy, calls him 'almost perfect'

Bang Showbiz / Jun 18, 2014, 13:17 (IST)

Jennifer Lopez may have just split from her boyfriend Casper Smart, but she's already got her eye on hunky model David Gandy.

Mel B puts a show before Spice show

Agencies / Nov 26, 2007, 00:00 (IST)

Pop star Melanie Brown has thrown the Spice Girls’ reunion tour rehearsals into chaos, after making it to the finals of the reality show 'Dancing With The Stars'.

Spice Girl to dance a new tune

TNN / Sep 01, 2007, 00:00 (IST)

The Spice Girl is one of 12 celebrities signed up to compete in the fifth series of the US TV dance contest.
